word: G5426 - φρονέω - phronéō - fron-eh'-o - Set the affection on

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Set the affection on
வினைச்சொல் - சிந்தி, அபிப்பிராயப்படு, எண்ணு, நினை, எண்ணங்கொள், சிந்தையாயிரு, நாடு, விசேஷித்துக்கொள்
3. to direct one's mind to a thing, to seek or strive for

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G5424; to exercise the mind, that is, entertain or have a sentiment or opinion; by implication to be (mentally) disposed (more or less earnestly in a certain direction); intensively to interest oneself in (with concern or obedience): - set the affection on, (be) care (-ful), (be like-, + be of one, + be of the same, + let this) mind (-ed, regard, savour, think.
Cognate: G5424, G5426, G5427, G5428, G5429, G5430, G877, G878
